talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>What's that? You have special permission
from the chief?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, that explains that! And...<sp:5:1:0>sorry
for shouting.

<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Wait... Maybe a voe could endure my
spa-plan practice?<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Notice>I've mostly worked on vai, so let me know
if I'm pressing too hard.
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>OK, mister voe—if you don't mind, would
you consider helping me with my
spa-plan practice?
I call it practice, but I can guarantee that
it will make your body feel good as new.
Don't worry about that!
But—and this is what I'm still working
on—if I get things just right...

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>you'll feel a boost of energy <clr:0000>just like<clr:ffff> with
the owner's spa plan!
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hee-hee! Just kidding! It's absolutely
adorable when you panic!

You know, we don't get many...any...
voe customers.

Would you consider helping me with my
spa-plan practice?
talk0018:
The apprentice spa plan is only <clr:0000>25 rupees<clr:ffff>
too! That's <clr:0000>half<clr:ffff> what the owner's plan
costs, you know!
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Sarqso! How long would you like
to relax for?
talk0019:
The apprentice spa plan is only <clr:0000>25 rupees<clr:ffff>
too! That's <clr:0000>half<clr:ffff> what the owner's plan
costs, you know!
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>OK... I've got to put all of my focus—all
of my power—into this!
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseS_01>Good practice for me! A good deal on
spa treatment for you!

Always glad to practice more, so you're
welcome back anytime!
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>I'm really only an apprentice, so there's
a lot left to learn.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Oh,<sp:5:0:0> but even so, I can guarantee that
it will make your body feel good as new.
Don't worry about that!
But—and this is what I'm still working
on—if I get things just right...

you'll feel a boost of energy <clr:0000>just like<clr:ffff> with
the owner's spa plan!
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh, I see. I guess practice can wait until
some other time, then...
talk0020:
The apprentice spa plan is only <clr:0000>25 rupees<clr:ffff>
too! That's <clr:0000>half<clr:ffff> what the owner's plan
costs, you know!
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>The apprentice spa plan is only <clr:0000>25 rupees<clr:ffff>
too! That's <clr:0000>half<clr:ffff> what the owner's plan
costs, you know!
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The apprentice spa plan is only <clr:0000>25 rupees<clr:ffff>
too! That's <clr:0000>half<clr:ffff> what the owner's plan
costs, you know!
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh... Looks like you don't have enough
money. Don't get me wrong, it's nice
that you're up for helping me practice...
But it still costs me a little to get all
the oils and such. I can't really lower
the price.
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>H-how...was that?<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, you might not be fully relaxed, but
you seem to be less tired, at least.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Clearly I still have a lot of practice ahead
of me, so come back anytime!
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>There's no line for helping me with my
spa-plan practice! I really appreciate any
opportunity to hone my skills!
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>You came back!


We don't ever get any voe customers,
so of course I remember you!

How about it? Will you <clr:0000>help me out <clr:ffff>with
my spa-plan practice?

<sp:3:0:2:0800>I have a better chance of getting it right
using these beds than with the ones in
the shelter.
